item.title: Amy Schumer announces divorce from husband Chris Fischer after seven years of marriage
item.description: Her announcement follows growing rumours that the marriage was on the rocks.

item.title: Aussie Olympian Ashleigh Gentle ‘proud’ after finishing T100 Triathlon series on a high following devastating miscarriage
item.description: The 34-year-old bravely competed just a week after experiencing unimaginable pain.

item.title: Heroin found in powder sold as common anti-anxiety drug Xanax, Victorian Pill Testing Service warns
item.description: The discovery highlights a high risk of overdose.

item.title: St Kilda’s Zak Jones announces AFL retirement in emotional post after 164 games for two clubs
item.description: ‘I don’t know exactly what comes next, and that’s scary.’

item.title: Phone of missing Belgian tourist Celine Cremer found in Tasmania two years after she vanished
item.description: The discovery was made on the first day of a renewed search led by her friends, who flew from Belgium to look for her.

item.title: Shirtless man on the run after ramming alleged stolen ute into police car 11 times in Melbourne
item.description: The man can be seen clambering over the police car in a dramatic escape.

item.title: England security guard lashes out at Channel 7 camera operator in ugly ‘confrontation’ at airport
item.description: A 7NEWS camera operator has been left shocked by the actions of a security guard.

item.title: Australian scientists make massive strides to identify and treat cancers
item.description: There is more hope than ever for the future of cancer treatment thanks to a game-changing approach.

item.title: ‘If only I’d hugged him tighter’: Sharon Osbourne shares heartbreaking details of final days with husband Ozzy
item.description: ‘He knew if he went ahead with the show, it would probably kill him.’

item.title: Two women and a child escape injury as barrage of shots fired at a Guildford West home in Sydney
item.description: A car was found alight shortly after.

item.title: TGA warns Australians after toxic supplements found in overseas imports
item.description: Australia’s medicine watchdog has found several tablets contain ‘extremely high levels’ of mercury, lead, arsenic and cadmium.

item.title: Hybrid car smashes Guinness World Record on Sydney to Melbourne drive
item.description: Two vehicles just proved range anxiety might be a thing of the past.

item.title: Hobart Hurricanes power to maiden WBBL title as skipper Elyse Villani gets fairytale retirement
item.description: ‘It has been playing on the back of my mind this season.’

item.title: Peter Greene dead: Strange details emerge over death of Pulp Fiction and The Mask actor
item.description: Peter Greene, 60, was found dead in his New York apartment on Friday.

item.title: AFL champion Jordan De Goey and reality TV star Aisha Jade McKinnon welcome birth of first child
item.description: The high-profile power couple have picked a unique name for their baby, who was ‘born under a full moon’.

item.title: Bonnie Blue deported from Bali: British adult entertainer kicked off Indonesian island
item.description: The controversial British adult entertainer won’t be able to return to Indonesia for a decade.

item.title: Aussie cult hero Seth O’Donnell claims rare Zatopek:10 double as Lauren Ryan burns off Leanne Pompeani
item.description: An era of athletics dominance was ended by a drummer in a rock band.

item.title: Queensland Police allege international tourist deliberately ran into group on Sunshine Coast footpath after ‘minor altercation’
item.description: Eight people were hit as the car mounted a curb on Queensland’s Sunshine Coast with one woman fighting for her life.

item.title: Usman Khawaja open to batting in the middle order as he eschews retirement speculation
item.description: ‘I’m not here to hang around.’

item.title: Woolworths and Coles hit back at new price gouging laws, label it an ‘uneven playing field’
item.description: ‘The law is ... creating an uneven playing field which will see much larger, foreign-owned retailers free to charge customers whatever they want.’

item.title: Moffat Beach: Police update after girl, 17, dies falling from popular Sunshine Coast lookout watching the sunset
item.description: ‘They were doing nothing other than enjoying life...(now) her family is going to be devastated before Christmas.’

item.title: Victoria Police arrest 37 people in four-day blitz on alleged repeated thieves and dangerous drivers
item.description: The four-day police operation across Melbourne led to 37 arrests.

item.title: Cameron Green admits feeling a ‘little embarrassed’ with Gabba dismissal ahead of third Ashes Test
item.description: ‘It looks quite bad.’

item.title: Car crashes through Vietnamese restaurant after hitting woman at Campbelltown, Western Sydney
item.description: The pedestrian was walking past when she was hit.

item.title: Multi-agency search launched for Belgian backpacker Celine Cremer after phone found in Tasmania
item.description: The 31-year-old disappeared more than two years ago.

item.title: Lady Gaga forced to stop Sydney show after Australian dancer Michael Dameski slides off stage in downpour
item.description: The relentless rain in Sydney created a tricky situation for the pop superstar and her team.

item.title: Brendon McCullum admits ugly airport incident with Seven cameraman ‘wasn’t ideal’ ahead of third Test
item.description: Brendon McCullum has addressed the team security guard who physically clashed with a Channel 7 cameraman

item.title: Police searching for black Toyota SUV after alleged hit-and-run leaves cyclist critical near Lake Macquarie, NSW
item.description: He was treated at the scene by specialist Careflight doctors before being taken to hospital.

item.title: Gunman killed, two in custody as police investigate ‘suspicious’ items after Bondi Beach shooting
item.description: Footage captured two men armed opening fire from a bridge.

item.title: Bondi Beach shooting: Gunmen open fire at Australia’s most famous beach with at least 12 people killed
item.description: Footage captured two men armed with high-powered guns opening fire from the footbridge.

item.title: Bondi Beach shooting: Jewish chaplain Vladimir Kotlyar speaks of horror after 10 killed, several injured
item.description: ‘They were shooting us like we were the enemy. This is Bondi. This is Australia.’

item.title: Bondi Beach shooting: What we know so far about the terror attack that killed 12 people
item.description: Authorities say one of the gunmen was known to police but not as an ‘immediate threat.’
